comment: We as the public can't let her get away with this,having other people donate for her, so they got their money, so she didn't lie nonsense!! The point was she wasn't a gold digger, she lived financially independent from JD, didn't want his money except to donate it so some good came out of this, almost like a punishment! She did NOT say she was going to have a bake sale and have other  people donate on her behalf! That's not the deal!! Saying she's had to keep it for court and lawyer fees is bullshit too! She said she lived financially independent from him, and she wasn't keeping the money ( she's even gone as far as saying on live tv that she already donated every penny, acting all like aren't I an amazing human being grr) Being financially independent means you don't need or want your ex husbands money to pay your bills, she's even had people continue to bill JD after the divorce hoping it would just slip threw the monthly bills, and then her and her father got so pissed off that he caught it and wouldn't pay that Mr Heard ( who is way to involved in his son in laws life) started throwing out death threats! We as the public who have been paying attention this whole time need to hold her feet to the fire and not let her get away with changing the narrative however it suits her! She's calling us stupid to our faces and betting we won't call her out on it! ( Reminds me of that part in Chicago where the guy who got caught in bed with two women said "come on baby are you gonna believe ME or YOUR EYES?" LOL )
